main.name: Eaindra Wun Pyae
bio: Originally from Myanmar, I am currently pursuing my Bachelor Degree in Computer Science at Jacobs University Bremen.
With keen interests in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision and Full-Stack Development
, and Artificial Intelligence, I am passionate about implementing efficient products and solutions for the community.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

first_yr: Programming in C/C++, Algorithms and Data Structures,
second_yr: Databases and Web Services, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture and Programming Languages,
Computer Graphics, Formal Languages and Logics,
Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Secure and Dependable Systems, Computation and Complexity, Machine Learning

work.title: Full-stack Web Developer Intern
description: Implemented responsive app-landing web pages for the company's application products,
and an interactive website with for teachers from government high schools with valid log-in access to add,
edit and/or retrieve particular students' details, and teachers' working status in the school

work.title: Tech Team Intern
work.description: Implemented Facebook Messenger Chatbots, for sending up-to-date articles on the website to subscribers, and processing registration, acceptance and payment by applicants and admins for the company’s online courses

curricular.name: Rotaract Club at Jacobs University Bremen
curricular.title: Social Media Manager
description: Running campaigns for bi-weekly projects of the club on social media pages, and collaborating with
other student-led clubs and event organizers on campus for fund-raising for various donation projects

curricular.name: Run Yangon 3.0
curricular.title: Organizer, Marketing & IT
description: The largest youth-led scavenger hunt in Yangon, Myanmar
Led campaigns and marketing posts for the event, application and payment processes for the participants

projects.title: Crypt It!
projects.category: A Telegram Chatbot to encrypt/decrypt messages

projects.title: Gesturely Automation
projects.category: An application which receives various hand gestures from webcam, detects the finger count, and sends signals to the Bobst’s simulator machine to perform specific operations

projects.title: Travel Guide
projects.category: An application built by using Google Assistant Voice Recognition and Skyscanner API to find and book cheapest fights from different destinations
